com.luigisgro.cqf.montecarlo
Interface MultiFactorModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultiFactorHJM
public interface MultiFactorModel

This interface isolates the model-depending features of a Monte Carlo simulation: the generation of a scenario for the underlying. There is no knowledge of the calculation of derivative value based on this scenario, or of the criteria to be satisfied for the simulation to be complete

Author:
Luigi Sgro

Method Summary
 int getDimension()
           
 Curve nextCurve(Curve currentCurve, double[] randomVector, double timeStep)
          Based on a current status of the underlying and a vector from a suitable distribution, calculates a next step of the underlying
 

Method Detail

nextCurve

Curve nextCurve(Curve currentCurve,
                double[] randomVector,
                double timeStep)
Based on a current status of the underlying and a vector from a suitable distribution, calculates a next step of the underlying

Parameters:
currentCurve - The current curve representing a state of the underlying today
randomVector - The vector to drive the evolution to the next state of the underlying
timeStep - The fraction of year from one state to the next
Returns:
A new curve representing a next state of the underlying

getDimension

int getDimension()
Returns:
The dimension of the model, i.e. the dimension of randomVector to be provided
